org.smartfrog.sfcore.common
Class LocalSmartFrogDescriptor

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.LocalSmartFrogDescriptor

public class LocalSmartFrogDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object

This class parses .sf files locally; it is used to load up a ComponentDescription, with the option of turning errors into an exception.

Most of the content is null/invalid until an attempt to parse is made
